message.content:
cs.RO, cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.HC 

This paper deals with the problem of allowing a robot to learn a new behavior by observing a human perform the skill just once. The paper presents an approach for one-shot learning from a video of a human by using human and robot demonstration data from a variety of previous tasks to build up prior knowledge through meta-learning. This involves adapting to changes in perspective, environment, and embodiment between the robot and the observed human. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category for this paper is Robotics (cs.RO), followed by Machine Learning (cs.LG), Computer Vision (cs.CV), Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI), and Human-Computer Interaction (cs.HC).
